events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it because it does not fit well. Please advise how I can get a refund.
The issue has been classified under the 'Refund' category based on the customer's request to return the product and get their money back.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! I’m Maria from customer support. I understand you want to return your jacket and request a refund. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know the condition of the jacket? That will help us process your refund quickly.
Thank you for responding. My order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and in its original packaging, so it should be in perfect condition for return.
We’ve verified your order details. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly. Once received, we’ll process your refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick reply! I appreciate the prepaid label offer and the clear timeline for the refund process.
I’ve sent the prepaid return label to your email. Please ship the jacket back at your earliest convenience. We’ll update you once the refund is processed.
Just checking in to confirm that you’ve received the return label and ask if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I did receive the label and shipped the jacket yesterday. I look forward to the refund soon. Thanks for the excellent support!
We have processed your refund successfully and closed your support case. Please contact us if you need any further help in the future.
